@echo off 
set config_version=2 
set cmode=c
set safe_mode=1 
set mysqlPath=C:\Program Files\MySQL\MySQL Server 8.1\bin\mysql.exe
set mysqlBinPath=C:\Program Files\MySQL\MySQL Server 8.1\bin
set mysqldumpPath=C:\Program Files\MySQL\MySQL Server 8.1\bin\mysqldump.exe
set lsuser=root
set lspass=MyN3wP4ssw0rd
set lsdb=l2srls
set lshost=localhost 
set cbuser=
set cbpass=
set cbdb=
set cbhost= 
set gsuser=root
set gspass=MyN3wP4ssw0rd
set gsdb=l2srgs
set gshost=localhost
set logdir=.
set backup=.
